verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

After the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> ye <S%H3427>dwelt,<s%> shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do:<s%> and after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> you, shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> in their <S%H2708>ordinances.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H2708>ordinances,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> therein: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Ye shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in them: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> of you shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> that is <S%H7607>near<s%> of <S%H1320>kin<s%> to him, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> their <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother,<s%> shalt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H517>mother;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> shalt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother,<s%> whether she be <S%H4138>born<s%> at <S%H1004>home,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4138>born<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of thy <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2007>theirs<s%> is thine own <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H4138>begotten<s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H269>sister,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H1>father's<s%> near <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> near <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thine <S%H1733>aunt.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H3618>daughter-in-law:<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> is thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> or her <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> for <S%H2007>they<s%> are her near <S%H7608>kinswomen:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H269>sister,<s%> to <S%H6887>vex<s%> her, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the other in her <S%H2416>life<s%> time.

Also thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> as long as she is put <S%H5079>apart<s%> for her <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>
Moreover thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> lie <S%H5414>carnally<s%> <S%H7903><s%> <S%H2233><s%> <S%H413>with<s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> thyself with her.

And thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>let<s%> any of thy <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2145>mankind,<s%> as <S%H4904>with<s%> <S%H802>womankind:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou <S%H5414>lie<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> thyself therewith: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H929>beast<s%> to lie <S%H7250>down<s%> thereto: <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H8397>confusion.<s%>

Defile not ye <S%H2930>yourselves<s%> <S%H408><s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of these <S%H428>things:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> cast <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you:

And the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> therefore I do <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> thereof <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and the <S%H776>land<s%> itself vomiteth <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> any of <S%H4480>these<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428><s%> <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> neither any of your own <S%H249>nation,<s%> nor any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you:

(For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> have the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled;)<s%>

That the <S%H776>land<s%> spew not you <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> also, when ye <S%H2930>defile<s%> it, <S%H834>as<s%> it spewed <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H6213>commit<s%> them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H4931>ordinance,<s%> that ye commit <S%H6213>not<s%> <S%H1115><s%> any one of these abominable <S%H4480>customs,<s%> <S%H2708><s%> <S%H8441><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and that ye defile not <S%H2930>yourselves<s%> <S%H3808><s%> therein: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
